title: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
subtitle: Wifi Consciousness
series: 101 Ways to Die in a Hostel
tagline: Some hostels are a bargain. Others cost you your life.

synopsis.short: A digital nomad's consciousness is uploaded to a hostel's cursed Wi-Fi network after entering a 66-character password that serves as an ancient summoning incantation for a djinn bound within the electromagnetic waves.

death_teaser: The password is the key, but the user is the door.
